3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear volumetric rendering with appropriate wall thickness and clean cutaway logic.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout fidelity; room adjacencies and wall proportions match the source plan almost perfectly.

interior_elements.notes: Accurate placement of beds, bathroom fixtures, and balcony furniture aligned with the 2D layout.

visual_clarity.notes: Highly readable monochromatic render; lighting defines geometry well without obscuring details.

detected_errors.description: Minor door swing arc representation differs slightly from architectural standard in the hallway.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains nearly all geometric and spatial relationships from the original 2D floor plan.
